price: 66. Pero tu pueblo (¡oh, Muhammad!) niega (el Corán) a pesar de que es la verdad. Diles: «No soy vuestro custodio (y no soy responsable de lo que hacéis)».
arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمُكَ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ قُل لَّسۡتُ عَلَيۡكُم بِوَكِيلٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wakadhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa al-ḥaqu qul lastu ʿalaykum biwakīlin
